News.headline: 50/50 Draw Chester FC
News.short_description: The Winner for the Daggers' Vanarama National League game versus Chester FC is ticket number 04864.
News.description:
The winning ticket worth £191.00 was drawn at half time. The winning ticket was claimed by John Robinson.

Second place winner for the £50 Johnstone's Paint voucher is ticket number 05330, which was claimed by Tony Ramsay.

The third place winner for the copy of Football Manager 2017 (PC) is ticket number 05189, this prize is yet to be claimed.

50/50 tickets can be purchased on match days for £1.
